title: Spurs remind players about social distancing after social media posts
description: Tottenham remind players of their responsibilities during the coronavirus lockdown after some appear to break social-distancing rules.
content:
Tottenham were eighth in the Premier League when the competition was halted
Tottenham have reminded their players of their responsibilities during the coronavirus lockdown after social media posts appeared to show some failing to follow social-distancing gui… [+1033 chars]
